snippet: BECK--Stuart, adored brother to Susan Champlin (Jim), and devoted uncle to Michael Champlin (Katie) and Julie Daniels (Andrew). A hole has been left in all of our hearts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BECK--Stuart, adored brother to Susan Champlin (Jim), and devoted uncle to Michael Champlin (Katie) and Julie Daniels (Andrew). A hole has been left in all of our hearts. 1/3
